pageProduct.name: QV Shower Milk 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

QV Shower Milk  is a moisturising body milk.

Warnings

Avoid eyes.  For external use only.  Take care to avoid slipping.  If irritation occurs, discontinue use.

Common Uses

QV Shower Milk is a luxurious lightweight body milk formulated to moisturise for visibly healthier skin.  Replenishes skin's natural moisture.

Ingredients

Paraffinum Liquidum, Mineral Oil (and) Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer,  (and) Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Laureth-3, Isopropyl Myristate.

Directions

In the shower:  Dispense the required amount into your hand.  Apply to wet skin and rub gently.  Rinse the skin and pat dry.
